post.body: Forget regifting. Nothing is a social faux pas because no one even knows the social "graces"
Blessings on your hosting. May your future parties be festive and well-attended
The same to you and yours; esoecially the beautiful Christmas gift in your arms in your icon
It's no different than yesterday's charity; the giver always wants to feel good. Is that a reason to reject the gift?
Congrats on turning pro. May all your utterances be publishable
respite, respect and rewards
Ugh! Been there, tried that, threw up. It ain't coffee
You're right, but at least its huggable
I used to laff at silly names, now I see the danger of bequething a legacy of evil, if not stupidity.I'm liking "Pooh" right now
Part of that book life was being "The Fixer." Kids won't think in terms of a book, but they will think in chapters. RU1?
From the lost bucket of cliches: Silence is golden;Talk is cheap; Words fail me; Speak no evil. The trite has bite, sometimes
I love the epiphany expressed in the word "perhaps." It's that moment of doubt, awareness and challenge. Some kids' story
I'm simply saying that cordiality is all @ perspective. the customer hates long waits and the waiter hates long lines 2
B4U criticize the Wendy"s staff, think of their perspective this Christmas. Much hasn't been given so don't expect many smiles
To whom much is given... To whom little is given what do we expect?
but still demands all the benefits and perquisites
What's the new icon? Is it a wheel of some type?
If there's love there, then it looks like Christmas
Pastoral ministries withstand economic downturn: You can't go less than zero. Forget IT and UAW woes
OMG. Why would I want to tweet with this guy? If I want to talk to him I'll visit an airport men's room
By intimidated do you mean your kids respect them; or that they're afraid of them?
I get your point. The site seems more submerged than emergent. Tipoff to false labeling is the reference to others as "pagans."
If you're into the living water of revelation then Aquanaut is also exciting
re: Madonna & Gucci- point taken. But people may need fine leather goods. Didn't Paul work with hides? Someone sells, someone buys
thnx for the second life link: cynicism with practicality. Makes me rethink my postings. NOT! Doesn't he get social networking?
mazel tov on a safe journey
Santa's naughty n nice list eliminates; Jesus' list targets those 4 special attention. It's like a rush party for sinners
Bigger roster, more variables. But give it time, it'll grow
From a post-mod evangel: I thought I was talking 2 U. Deconstruction of church makes us all part of the conversation; @anything
How does NE keep winning when everyone counted them out on week 1?
Every wk I brace for failure in church planting and God always confounds me. Fear trumped by grace
Sunday's sermon: Home for Christmas. Where is home? How 2 get there? That's Y Jesus came: 2 show the way or 2 bring a little home here 2 us
Check out American time use survey (ATUS) 2C UR priorities. Will the new year be like last year? God gets <hour per week, 4 mins/day at best
Looking forward to Christmas eve candlelight service. Only problem: It's 2 days away...aargh
Only person who wishes more than me that Joe Biden would just shut up is probably Barack Obama. JB's the synthesis of arrogance & stupidity
Drawback to Christian faith: Can't curse like I used to; even offended by others cursing. Denied a familiar & oft-used vocabulary.New words?
How 2 make xmas eve service relevant to casual participants? Pile on the traditional or tap the contemporary? Leaning toward spiritual&quiet
Giants won and I'm happy. But why, I'm a Bears fan? The NJ environment must be rubbing off on me. Oh bother. I must need a trip home
Churches in my area of NW, NJ cancelled services 2day because of weather concerns. Now I'm watching 70,000 people at Giants stadium for game
Don't buy a car made on Monday; Don't buy fish on Monday; Never call in sick on Monday. No 1 says TGI Monday. Can we start the week on tues?
